articles.title: Rapid evolution of A(H5N1) influenza viruses after intercontinental spread to North America - Nature.com
articles.description: Highly pathogenic avian influenza A(H5N1) viruses of clade 2.3.4.4b underwent an explosive geographic expansion in 2021 among wild birds and domestic poultry. Here, Kandeil et al. show that the Western movement of this clade was followed by reassortment with …
